interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Blues for Willadean
Review Date: 2014/04/13
Store: Beth Grant  (Actor),     Octavia Spencer  (Actor),     Del Shores  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['Review', 'Two N.A.A.C.P. Awards for Del Shores and this material, based on the original stageplay, The Trials and Tribulations of a Trailer Trash Housewife. --NAACP Awards', 'About the Actor', 'Beth Grant (as Willadean) is popularly recognized from her many feature film roles, including No Country for Old Men, and her current TV series role on The Mindy Project; Octavia Spencer has built a solid career following her recent Oscar win for her memorable performance in The Help; Dale Dickey can be seen on True Blood and many features and series, most recently on Breaking Bad.', 'About the Director', "Del Shores is an acclaimed film director with roots in playwriting / directing and producing. He is also a noted regular on the stand-up comedy circuit and is a respected activist for a variety of progressive causes. Notable film and TV projects include Sordid Lives and Daddy's Dyin, Who's Got The Will.", 'See more']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Del Shores', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 53 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 21, 2014', 'Actors': 'Beth Grant, Octavia Spencer, Dale Dickey, David Steen, Debby Holiday', 'Studio': 'Hannover House', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: The performances of each actor were as powerful as the message of the movies subject line. The movie brings to front the hush and hidden denials of many relationships. It causes the viewer to question their own responsibility for friends or relatives, who they suspect may be in relationships that are abusive. It is a must see for everyone. Because everyone in someway will see their own reflection, some which they may wish not to acknowledge.
Review Title: Outstanding Performance and Storyline!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile: The user demonstrates a strong preference for drama films, particularly those that explore complex social themes and relationships. They favor works that feature compelling performances and powerful storytelling, as evidenced by their enthusiastic review praising the film's ability to provoke self-reflection about personal responsibilities in relationships. The user values films that feature esteemed actors and directors, indicating an appreciation for quality production and talent. Their high rating suggests a discerning taste, likely favoring narratives that are both poignant and thought-provoking. The emphasis on societal issues and personal accountability hints at a progressive mindset and an interest in films that address significant life challenges. Overall, the user seeks impactful cinema that not only entertains but also engages with deeper questions about human nature and personal connections.
